review_data.title: Very cozy and friendly place
review_data.content: I came here with my fiancé to spend a quality time together. We loved the pub and the staff here. The decorations for x-mas are also super lovely. I highly recommend this pub for visit with you better half or better with a group of...More

review_data.title: Great Service and Food
review_data.content: Came here with my friends.. had an amazing time. Great service and quick too. Would HIGHLY RECOMMEND to go and enjoy..

review_data.title: Do not order from this restaurant
review_data.content: Never order food from this restaurant. Food arrived cold 130 minutes after ordered. Courier didn't even say sorry, and restaurant and delivery service gave no refund. Overall the worst experience I've ever had with a restaurant in Zurich.

review_data.title: McGee’s
review_data.content: There’s a very cosy atmosphere. Excellent service and great food. I strongly recommend this location for having a good beer and meet people.

review_data.title: Nice pub
review_data.content: A nice pub, vriendly personal and owner. Our pubcrawl started here. They also have nice apple cider.

review_data.title: Decent beer place
review_data.content: Was here a couple of times last week. Came here with colleagues. We had some nice beers bad nachos. Staff is nice and fast to serve. Enjoyed it

review_data.title: Gopi has a great team and a great attitude
review_data.content: A very good host, great service and a good pint. Opposite the train station so really easy to get to. I would go again.

review_data.title: Finally Reasonable Pricing in Zurich
review_data.content: We visited this bar by chance while visiting Zurich. We chose it simply because the menu didn’t have astronomical prices like the rest of the city. But we had a great experience! The waitress and everyone else was very friendly and helpful. There was nice...More

review_data.title: Ich komme nicht mehr
review_data.content: Ich war früher öfter hier und war sehr enttäuscht, als ich neulich wieder einmal hier einkehrte. Das Interieur erinnert mittlerweile...More

review_data.title: Open Mic at Mcgees Irish Pub-fortnightly on Sundays
review_data.content: I highly recommend this open mic whether you are a musician, music lover or fond of a pint! An eclectic group of musicians, playing a wide range of well known and original songs and the night was hosted by Yana, also a stunning singer/guitarist! The...More

review_data.title: Indian Pub with a Irish touch
review_data.content: Erstwhile used to be Krishna restaurant. Nice dosa and biriyani available. Wash it down with a pint of Guinness. Large Indian groups watching cricket keep the place buzzing.

review_data.title: Nein Danke!

review_data.title: Never again
review_data.content: Als ich das Lokal über Mittag betrat, war es menschenleer und kalt. Der Burger, der mir vorgesetzt wurde, war von...More

review_data.title: Thumbs up!
review_data.content: I enjoy it there, It`s basic, but good, Usually very good service and the food is excellent. They have special events and it`s well run.

review_data.title: EM 2016

review_data.title: Wirklich schlechtes Essen
review_data.content: Der schlechteste Burger den ich in Zürich gegessen habe. Billiges Brot, billiger Schmelzkäse (kalt, nicht geschmolzen), schlechtes, billiges Fleisch. Auch...More

review_data.title: Earlier known as Krishnaa's Indian Restaurant
review_data.content: We looked at the reviews for “Krishnaa’s Veg Restaurant” online and were keen to try this one since it said “Vegetarian” restaurant. We took the tram No. 14, opp the train station and reached the place in about 15-20 mins. We had google map with...More

review_data.title: Irish pub across from Zurich Wiedikon station
review_data.content: Came here for lunch, food is reasonably good, prices also reasonable. Guiness and Kilkenney available. I would come again evenings and sit outside.

review_data.title: Hopi the greatest
review_data.content: Great time at Mc gee's in Zurich the owner Hopi was the on floor getting busy working hard so that we could have a great time. His team, the ambience all amazing and guess what my team won!!! Go Barca!!! Go Hopi.

review_data.title: Schrecklicher service!!!
review_data.content: Obwohl im Pub gähnende Leere herrschte wurden wir weder begrüsst noch direkt bedient. Auf die bestellten Getränke mussten wir etwa...More

review_data.title: go for the beer
review_data.content: The food is 3(5) at it's best. Typical irish pub abroad with a standard international crowd. Can't go wrong on beer. Wouldn't come here to eat but the food will (most likely) not kill you either.

review_data.title: Burger time
review_data.content: 5 guys hungry for discussion, beers and burgers. We finally ended up staying there a bit longer than planned ;-). The staff was friendly, food was alright, beer and shots selection excellent. And they are open Sundays too, so all in all a very good...More

review_data.title: Desinteressiertes Personal
review_data.content: Obwohl im Pub nur sehr wenig los war, wurden wir nicht bedient und noch nicht einmal begrüsst, obwohl ein Angestellter...More

review_data.title: Nice pubs with the option to eat
review_data.content: Typical pub: you go there for drinks and you will eat something that you can drink more. Normal pubfood, mostly fried and tasty but you get this things everywhere else. Staff is friendly.

review_data.title: Second Zurich location. Very nice staff
review_data.content: The McGees Pub now has a second location in addition to the Wiedikon location. The new location is in Oerlikon at Tram stop Salerstieg, one stop before downtown Oerlikon. Tram lines #10/11/14 all stop here. A variety of beers are on tap, though during grand...More

review_data.title: Hit or miss
review_data.content: My wife and I went here for something close. The service was slow, they had mojitos as a drink special, my wife ordered one, but they has no rum. They didn't tell us that and had a guy bring some in. Took 20min for one...More

review_data.title: An okay visit
review_data.content: I went back for a second visit and I would say this visit was just ok. The Swiss burger and large serving of fries CHF 22.50. I also had a beer CHF 8.90. I have yet to see more than a couple of other customers...More

review_data.title: Best Potato Chips and Onion Rings ever
review_data.content: Das Mc Gee's ist die Stammkneipe der Zürcher Couch - Surfer Freunde, bisher habe ich es im McGee's bei Drinks...More

review_data.title: Good food, friendly host
review_data.content: Located across the street from Bahnhof Wiedikon. Lots of decorations throughout the pub and a larger seating area than I had expected. There is also a large patio area, but not very enticing as this pub is located at a very hectic traffic intersection (bus/tram/cars/trucks/peds/bikers)....More

review_data.title: Classic pub in Zurich
review_data.content: This pub provides a pleasing pub experience that meets expectations- normal pub food done up right in a friendly atmosphere. They serve great cheeseburgers (plus a vegi-burger) as well as fish and chips several beers on draught (Guiness, Fosters). Once a month we come here...More

review_data.title: Freundliche Bedienung und gute Whiskyauswahl
